Plot: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.
Title: Galaxy Quest
Writer: David Howard (story), David Howard (screenplay), Robert Gordon (screenplay)
Actors: Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman, Tony Shalhoub
tomatoConsensus: Intelligent and humorous satire with an excellent cast -- no previous Trekkie knowledge needed to enjoy this one.
